add.title: ⚔️ New Quest
add.subtitle: QUEST ACCEPTED
add.body: '{quest}' has been inscribed in your Quest Log
add.tip: Use 'grit-guardian add' to accept new quests from the Guild Hall.

delete.confirmation_message_1: Are you certain you wish to abandon the quest '{quest}'?
delete.deleted_message: 📜 Quest '{quest}' has been removed from your log.

list.empty_message: Your Quest Log is empty, brave adventurer!

status.tip: Use 'grit-guardian status' to see today's quests.

complete.title: 🌟 QUEST COMPLETED! 🌟
complete.guide: - Complete a quest: grit-guardian complete 'Morning Reading'

wisdom.one_at_a_time: Focus your strength on one quest at a time!
wisdom.one_at_a_time_alt: 💡 Tip: Focus on one habit at a time to build momentum!
